About the Game:

Sacred 3 is an arcade Hack  n  Slash game for up to four players,
set in the war for Ancaria. Choose from legendary heroes and fight
together against the rise of evil. You will face hordes of grimmocs,
brute beasts, legions of mercenaries and undead wizards. Develop your
character s skills and abilities and band together to use powerful
co-op abilities and tactics. Victory Is Ours. Glory Is Mine.

Main Game Features:

* Play as 1 of 4 legendary heroes, each with unique skills and weapons
* Master special attacks and quickly decimate hoards of enemies
* Perform powerful co-op combat arts to defeat epic bosses together
* Level up and customize your hero, outshine your fellow warriors
* Equip dynamic weapon spirits to empower your journey


1. Unrar.
2. Burn or mount the image.
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
   your game install directory.
5. Play the game.
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
